name: Jumpscare
description: Randomly jumpscares you when you die

randomize.name: Randomize jumpscares
randomize.description: If enabled, the jumpscare will be randomized between the available ones

from_percent.name: After percentage (classic)
from_percent.description: Only triggers the jumpscare after a certain percentage

from_time.name: After seconds (platformer)
from_time.description: Only triggers the jumpscare after a certain number of seconds

only_from_0.name: Only from 0%
only_from_0.description: If enabled, the jumpscare won't get triggered if you are in practice or testmode

full_volume.name: Full volume
full_volume.description: If enabled, the jumpscare's audio will always play at full volume

disable_blink.name: Disable blinking effect
disable_blink.description: If enabled, the blinking effect of the jumpscare effect will be disabled

button.name: Show button in pause menu
button.description: If enabled, a button that opens this settings page will appear in the pause menu
